text:
[Verse]
Sun is rising here we go
Morning light begins to glow
Feel the warmth on my face
Let it shine let's embrace

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing in the sky
Joys of life they can't deny
Start the day with a smile
Walk with me stay a while

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here again
Let the fun begin my friend
Dance with me under blue skies
Let the sun light up your eyes

[Verse 3]
Picnic blankets on the ground
Laughter echoing all around
Summer breeze through the trees
Every moment feels so free

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here again
Let the fun begin my friend
Dance with me under blue skies
Let the sun light up your eyes

[Bridge]
No more shadows only light
Chasing dreams from day to night
Hold my hand we'll make it through
Sunny days just me and you
title: Sunny Days
